001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import java.nio.file.Path;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007
008/**
009 * Configuration for the capture CLI, covering NIC selection, IO modes, and file rotation.
010 *
011 * @param iface network interface name to capture from
012 * @param filter optional BPF filter expression
013 * @param snaplen libpcap snap length in bytes
014 * @param bufferBytes capture buffer size in bytes
015 * @param timeoutMillis polling timeout in milliseconds
016 * @param promiscuous whether to enable promiscuous mode
017 * @param immediate whether to request immediate mode from libpcap
018 * @param outputDirectory directory for persisted segment files in file mode
019 * @param fileBase filename prefix for rotated segment files
020 * @param rollMiB maximum file size before rotation (mebibytes)
021 * @param httpOutputDirectory directory for HTTP poster artifacts
022 * @param tn3270OutputDirectory directory for TN3270 poster artifacts
023 * @param ioMode capture persistence mode ({@link IoMode#FILE} or {@link IoMode#KAFKA})
024 * @param kafkaBootstrap Kafka bootstrap servers (required for Kafka mode)
025 * @param kafkaTopicSegments Kafka topic for segments in Kafka mode
026 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027 */
028public record CaptureConfig(
029    String iface,
030    String filter,
031    int snaplen,
032    int bufferBytes,
033    int timeoutMillis,
034    boolean promiscuous,
035    boolean immediate,
036    Path outputDirectory,
037    String fileBase,
038    int rollMiB,
039    Path httpOutputDirectory,
040    Path tn3270OutputDirectory,
041    IoMode ioMode,
042    String kafkaBootstrap,
043    String kafkaTopicSegments) {
044
045  /**
046   * Validates capture configuration values.
047   *
048   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
049   */
050  public CaptureConfig {
051    if (iface == null || iface.isBlank()) {
052      throw new IllegalArgumentException("iface must be provided");
053    }
054    if (outputDirectory == null) {
055      throw new IllegalArgumentException("outputDirectory must be provided");
056    }
057    if (httpOutputDirectory == null) {
058      throw new IllegalArgumentException("httpOutputDirectory must be provided");
059    }
060    if (tn3270OutputDirectory == null) {
061      throw new IllegalArgumentException("tn3270OutputDirectory must be provided");
062    }
063    if (fileBase == null || fileBase.isBlank()) {
064      throw new IllegalArgumentException("fileBase must be provided");
065    }
066    if (rollMiB <= 0) {
067      throw new IllegalArgumentException("rollMiB must be positive");
068    }
069    ioMode = Objects.requireNonNullElse(ioMode, IoMode.FILE);
070    if (ioMode == IoMode.KAFKA) {
071      if (kafkaBootstrap == null || kafkaBootstrap.isBlank()) {
072        throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap is required when ioMode=KAFKA");
073      }
074      if (kafkaTopicSegments == null || kafkaTopicSegments.isBlank()) {
075        throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaTopicSegments is required when ioMode=KAFKA");
076      }
077    }
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Provides default capture settings that assume local file output.
082   *
083   * @return default configuration
084   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
085   */
086  public static CaptureConfig defaults() {
087    return new CaptureConfig(
088        "eth0",
089        null,
090        65_535,
091        1_024 * 1_024 * 1_024,
092        1_000,
093        true,
094        true,
095        Path.of("out", "segments"),
096        "segments",
097        1_024,
098        Path.of("out", "http"),
099        Path.of("out", "tn3270"),
100        IoMode.FILE,
101        null,
102        "radar.segments");
103  }
104
105
106  /**
107   * Creates a configuration from a map of settings.
108   *
109   * @param args configuration map, typically derived from CLI input
110   * @return parsed configuration
111   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if validation fails
112   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
113   */
114  public static CaptureConfig fromMap(Map<String, String> args) {
115    Map<String, String> kv = args == null ? Map.of() : new HashMap<>(args);
116    CaptureConfig defaults = defaults();
117
118    String iface = normalized(kv.getOrDefault("iface", defaults.iface()));
119    if (iface == null) {
120      throw new IllegalArgumentException("iface must be provided");
121    }
122
123    String filter = normalized(kv.getOrDefault("bpf", defaults.filter()));
124    int snap = parseInt(kv.get("snap"), defaults.snaplen());
125    int bufferBytes = Math.max(1, parseInt(kv.get("bufmb"), defaults.bufferBytes() / (1024 * 1024))) * 1024 * 1024;
126    int timeout = parseInt(kv.get("timeout"), defaults.timeoutMillis());
127    boolean promisc = parseBoolean(kv.get("promisc"), defaults.promiscuous());
128    boolean immediate = parseBoolean(kv.get("immediate"), defaults.immediate());
129
130    String outRaw = normalized(firstNonBlank(kv, "out", "segmentsOut"));
131    Path outputDir = defaults.outputDirectory();
132    IoMode ioMode = parseIoMode(kv.get("ioMode"), defaults.ioMode());
133    String kafkaTopicSegments = defaults.kafkaTopicSegments();
134
135    if (outRaw != null) {
136      if (outRaw.startsWith("kafka:")) {
137        ioMode = IoMode.KAFKA;
138        kafkaTopicSegments = sanitizeTopic(outRaw.substring("kafka:".length()));
139      } else {
140        outputDir = Path.of(outRaw);
141      }
142    }
143
144    String fileBase = normalized(kv.getOrDefault("fileBase", defaults.fileBase()));
145    int rollMiB = parseInt(kv.get("rollMiB"), defaults.rollMiB());
146    Path httpOut = parsePath(kv.get("httpOut"), defaults.httpOutputDirectory());
147    Path tnOut = parsePath(kv.get("tnOut"), defaults.tn3270OutputDirectory());
148
149    String kafkaBootstrap = normalized(kv.get("kafkaBootstrap"));
150    kafkaTopicSegments = normalized(kv.getOrDefault("kafkaTopicSegments", kafkaTopicSegments));
151
152    return new CaptureConfig(
153        iface,
154        filter,
155        snap,
156        bufferBytes,
157        timeout,
158        promisc,
159        immediate,
160        outputDir,
161        fileBase,
162        rollMiB,
163        httpOut,
164        tnOut,
165        ioMode,
166        kafkaBootstrap,
167        kafkaTopicSegments);
168  }
169
170  private static IoMode parseIoMode(String value, IoMode fallback) {
171    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
172      return fallback;
173    }
174    return IoMode.fromString(value.trim());
175  }
176
177  private static String sanitizeTopic(String topic) {
178    if (topic == null) {
179      return null;
180    }
181    String trimmed = topic.trim();
182    if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {
183      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Kafka topic must not be blank");
184    }
185    return trimmed;
186  }
187
188  private static String normalized(String value) {
189    if (value == null) {
190      return null;
191    }
192    String trimmed = value.trim();
193    return trimmed.isEmpty() ? null : trimmed;
194  }
195
196  private static int parseInt(String value, int fallback) {
197    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
198      return fallback;
199    }
200    try {
201      return Integer.parseInt(value.trim());
202    } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
203      return fallback;
204    }
205  }
206
207  private static boolean parseBoolean(String value, boolean fallback) {
208    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
209      return fallback;
210    }
211    return Boolean.parseBoolean(value.trim());
212  }
213
214  private static Path parsePath(String value, Path fallback) {
215    String normalized = normalized(value);
216    return normalized == null ? fallback : Path.of(normalized);
217  }
218
219  private static String firstNonBlank(Map<String, String> map, String... keys) {
220    for (String key : keys) {
221      String value = map.get(key);
222      if (value != null && !value.isBlank()) {
223        return value;
224      }
225    }
226    return null;
227  }
228}
